responses: Hi there, how can I help?
Hi, what can I do for you today?
What do you call a robot who likes to row? A row-bot!
How do robots pay for things? With cache, of course!
What is a robot's favorite type of music? Heavy metal!

patterns: is it possible to cancel order
responses: To cancel your order, please go to Account/Order/Cancel Order

patterns: is it possible to get refund
I want to request a refund
responses: To request a refund, go to Account/Your Orders/Request Refund

patterns: How long should I wait for refund
how long should it take to get refund
responses: the refund will be initiated in 2 buisiness days

patterns: I want to return item after 30 days
is it possible to return items after 30 days
responses: If you want to return items after 30 days of a purchase, please contact us directly at Account/Customer Service

patterns: the item I got is incorrect
What should I do if I received damaged items
responses: You can either request a refund or return defective items for replacement

patterns: what time does work the best for you
responses: I am available 24/7 365days. Talk to me whenever you want!

patterns: what are the products you sell
how can I see the products
responses: we sell groceries, clothes, digital devices, cosmetics, and many more!

patterns: How long does it take for shipping

responses: Items you purchased will be delivered within a week

patterns: my items are not still delivered

responses: If your items are not delivered within a week, please contact xx-xxxx-xxxx for more information.

how to change password without current password
